nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,15 @@
+# This sets the global logging level and specifies the appenders
+status = error
+rootLogger.level = error
+rootLogger.appenderRef.stdout.ref = STDOUT
+
+# settings for the console appender
+appender.console.type = Console
+appender.console.name = STDOUT
+appender.console.layout.type = PatternLayout
+appender.console.layout.pattern = %-4r %d [%t] %-5p [%c] %x - %m%n
+
+# To debug the native implementation
+#loggers = classLevelLogger
+#logger.classLevelLogger.name = org.wso2.micro.gateway.core.{ClassName}
+#logger.classLevelLogger.level = debug
